column4: ok question: if i instal, for example MOZILLA SUITE, i have a lot of other dependencies to install with it...total 104MiB, so if I remove Mozilla, how do i remove all the dependencies, without writing em all down!?

Well generally you don't because those libraries are often used by other things, sometimes there not, however if the stuff depends on mozilla it will be removed with it, plsu there is the orphaned stuff
Unless your really low on disk space or something, it doesnt hurt to leave them there...
